alert.note: Alert for Codington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 8:36AM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River Below Watertown affecting Codington County. North Fork Yellow Medicine River near Milbank affecting Grant County. .The river level has fallen from moderate flood stage to minor flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...River levels have dropped from Moderate to Minor severity, and flooding continues. * WHERE...Big Sioux River Below Watertown. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flooding begins to affect significant amounts of pasture and crop land * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 11.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 AM CDT Thursday was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon by 530 PM CDT.
